REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2074 reute r f BC-AUSIMONT-COMPO-<AUS> 03-16 0047

TEXT.TITLE: AUSIMONT COMPO <AUS> SEEKS SHARE INCREASE
TEXT.BODY: Ausimont Compo NV said it will ask shareholders at the annual meeting to approve an increase in authorized common shares to 90 mln shares from 50 mln. The company now has about 28.4 mln shares outstanding. Reuter
